data.name: Cubey's Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Cubey's Adventure is a 3D third-person adventure platformer where you play as 'Cubey'. Through completely physics-based gameplay you must solve puzzles, hide from enemies and jump across boundaries never before seen by a 6-sided being.

The unique story mode transports you across various realms, each one with their own obstacles, enemies, storyline and plenty of secrets.

The multiplayer mode, however, allows you to explore more open-world areas, pursuing quests and collecting accessories for your Cubey.
data.about_the_game:
Cubey's Adventure is a 3D third-person adventure platformer where you play as 'Cubey'. Through completely physics-based gameplay you must solve puzzles, hide from enemies and jump across boundaries never before seen by a 6-sided being.

The unique story mode transports you across various realms, each one with their own obstacles, enemies, storyline and plenty of secrets.

The multiplayer mode, however, allows you to explore more open-world areas, pursuing quests and collecting accessories for your Cubey.
data.short_description: You play as Cubey, who is a Cube. Use your Cubeyness to escape various situations and become the ULTIMATE CUBE. (you are the only cube either way)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 (2 * 2930), AMD Athlon II X2 270 (2 * 3400)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti (1024 MB), Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
